item.title: Switch Command ? Mage Book Switching?
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“Navy x Seal, post:3, topic:426754”]i got an error. 8 error’s say ing

c.
^ or somthing[/quote]

And you can’t fix it yourself? Nvm, I did it.

if(playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("switch")) {
    if(p.magic-book == 0) {
        p.magic-book = 1;
        c.sendMessage("You switch your magic book.");
    } else if(p.magic-book == 1) {
        p.magic-book = 0;
        c.sendMessage("You switch your magic book.");
    }
}

I don’t think this will make a big difference and if errors occur, make one from scratch.

Read full topic

item.title: Switch Command ? Mage Book Switching?
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

Is all you do is ask questions :mad: ?

OT:

if(playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("switch")) {
    if(c.magic-book == 0) {
        c.magic-book = 1;
        c.sendMessage("You switch your magic book.");
    } else if(c.magic-book == 1) {
        c.magic-book = 0;
        c.sendMessage("You switch your magic book.");
    }
}

And if you want it to not happen in wild:

if(playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("switch")) {
     (c.inWild));
     return;
                      if(c.magic-book == 0) {
                           c.magic-book = 1;
                           c.sendMessage("You switch your magic book.");
             } else if(c.magic-book == 1) {
                           c.magic-book = 0;
                           c.sendMessage("You switch your magic book.");
             }
}
